verbose_text: It is clear from the results shown in Fig. XREF_FIG a that transgenic lines L1 (BD-33-24-4-3-1-2, 4) and L2 (BD-33-24-4-9-3-4, 5) were more healthy after 28 days of severe stress than after 2 days of re-watering, indicating that the drought inducible expression of the AtDREB1A gene driven by the strong promoter rd29A functions in a drought-tolerant pathway.
